answer: The Joint Committee Update on Risks and Vulnerabilities in the EU Financial System – Spring 2025, specifically under the section discussing "Capital requirements and risks," likely applies ESMA's banking capital requirements and regulatory framework to defined benefit pension schemes, using bank capital ratios as a proxy for pension scheme funding levels.
ground_truth: Funding Ratios (DB schemes) section; Solvency II regulatory framework; Reference date: 2024-09-30
